name: hugo-clean-cache
description: Clean Hugo caches and generated resources (resources/_gen, public, hugogridgallery cache).

scripts.release:patch: npm run build:noop && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:noop && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run build:noop && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public

author: Carsten Nichte
